Make a choice whether the Bitcoin price will fall or rise within the next few minutes.
If your prediction was correct, the Bitcoin will break free.
But be careful, if you are wrong, the Bitcoin blocks again.



Win awards
If you have made the right choice 3 times in a row, then you win an award.



Try it out, it's fun
And now worry, you can loose nothing, prof your knowledge with an risk.



How the Crypto Currency Challenge works:
- Start the challenge with 10’000 points
- To win the challenge, you need to earn as much points as the current Bitcoin value is
- Make a guess if the price will rise or fall in the next 2 minutes.
- Set the score you want to use
- During the countdown to zero you see, if your estimation is right or wrong
- The bitcoin price is displayed in real time.
- After the time is up, you see if you are right or wrong and get the points.



Bonus
- If you are right 3 times in a row, you will also get an award

Other functions
- See in the statistics how often you were right or wrong
- Real time rates of the Bitcoin




Disclaimer
With the Bitcoin Challenge App, you will never risk losing your money. It is a game only.
